author: Nexxed
title: Update v2.0.8-beta
content: Added TailwindCSS support to the forums for theming
Fixed multiple issues that were caused by Vue being mounted to the DOM improperly
Fixed an issue that caused an error when trying to like or unlike a post
Fixed spoilers being broken in posts
Removed custom shoutbox emojis due to conflicts
Updated various elements of the UI for a more modern look and feel

author: Nexxed
title: Update v2.0.0-beta
content: Added new emojis to the shoutbox that directly replace the existing ones (new emoji picker coming soon, maybe)
Added the ability to save custom themes and scripts to a personal list for later selection
Added support for loading more than one theme
Added scripting API with support for interface elements
Updated to a new UI framework, powered by Vue.js for seamless integration
